Summary: Bright light over Hill AFB Broke apart
divs: Sighting Details I was pregnant with my second child and basically couldn't sleep beacause of heartburn. Our window in the front room faced east towards Hill AFB and the mountains . I noticed this really bluish white ,really bright light , it was kind of just hovering, then it broke apart into little light that zig zagged around , like bees or something, they did that for about 30 seconds and them they came back together and became the ball of light again. It was quite big, me being the dufus that I am just thought " That's weird" and went and layed down on the couch and tried to get some shut eye.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Clinton
There were no other sightings in Clinton on or around July 31st 1987
